cantConnectInfo: Reaching the backend server is taking longer than expected. This service is probably unavailable, possibly for maintenance, or there could be an issue with your internet connectivity. In any case, sorry about this, you may want to try again later.
usernameInfo: The username must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters long.
passwordInfo: The password must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters long, and ideally, hard to guess.
no-categories-found: No categories have been added to this portfolio yet.
not-found-description: There is nothing on this page. This is probably a bug in the web application.
input-too-short: This field should be longer, between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
input-too-long: This field should be shorter, between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
input-not-alphadashnumeric: This field should only contain letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9), and dashes (-).

slug.name: Slug
slug.help: A short alphanumeric id for the portfolio, used in its URL.

author.name: Author
author.help: The name of the author of the works included in the portfolio, shown prominently.

title.name: Title
title.help: The title of the portfolio, could be just "Portfolio", or maybe something more elaborate.

subtitle.name: Subtitle
subtitle.help: A longer, more elaborate description of the author and the works.

publish.name: Publish
publish.help: When selected, this portfolio will be available without login.

slug.name: Slug
slug.help: A short alphanumeric id for the portfolio, used in its URL.

short-description.name: Short description
short-description.help: Shown below the title in listings of works, but not on the work's own page.

long-description.name: Long description
long-description.help: Shown on the work's own page.

tag.name: Name
tag.help: The name of the tag to add, shown next to works as a "button" or "chip".

DownloadWindows.name: Windows-version
DownloadWindows.help: Downloadable version of the work for the Windows operating system.

DownloadLinux.name: Linux-version
DownloadLinux.help: Downloadable version of the work for the Linux operating system.

DownloadMac.name: MacOS-version
DownloadMac.help: Downloadable version of the work for the MacOS operating system.

CoverImage.name: Cover
CoverImage.help: The main image shown in listings of works.

Trailer.name: Trailer
Trailer.help: A video shown prominently on the work page.

Screenshot.name: Screenshot
Screenshot.help: An image shown prominently on the work page if the work doesn't have a trailer.

action.create-new-category: Add a new category of works

error.NetworkError: Connection failed, please try again later.
error.UnrecognizedResponse: Something went wrong, we're unsure what, but something's not working. Sorry about this.
error.InternalServerError: There was an issue in the backend, which requires further investigation. Maybe try again later?
error.InvalidSession: Your session has expired, please login again.
error.SlugTaken: This slug is already in use.
